publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6294 Rhona Brankin: Congratulations to Lasswade Rugby Football Club, Scottish Hydro Shield Champions and Club of the Month—That the Parliament congratulates Lasswade Rugby Football Club on winning the 2010 Scottish Hydro National Shield, Kyle Smith of Lasswade on winning the man-of-the-match and coach Dave Cockburn on leading the club to victory; acknowledges the fine performance of Greenock Wanderers RFC as runners-up; further congratulates Lasswade RFC on being awarded the Scottish Hydro Club of the Month for March 2010, decided by panellists from across the rugby community, including Scottish Rugby Council members, and notes that, in addition to this recognition, the club will receive total prize money of £1,000 from Scottish Rugby and Scottish Hydro. Supported by: Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Dr Richard Simpson*

S3M-6294 Congratulations to Lasswade Rugby Football Club, Scottish Hydro Shield Champions and Club of the Month (lodged on 11 May 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*, Sarah Boyack*, Elaine Smith*

S3M-6294 Congratulations to Lasswade Rugby Football Club, Scottish Hydro Shield Champions and Club of the Month (lodged on 11 May 2010) Gil Paterson*, Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*, George Foulkes*
